S.FORM: Taywan Yiyang Sayiunnganganː ci Taywan ku ngangan u etulː u tatama u nalecuhan ː 2010.2.15 u minalu(niyazu') ː Ciwidiyan, Kalingku a kuwan wamaː ci Sayan Tiway Sayun winaː ci Hong Mansan sabamaː ci Kilang Sayan Sayun kawawː micudaday
